name: Gradient Masking/Obfuscation
description: Measures the effectiveness of gradient masking or obfuscation techniques used to protect against gradient-based attacks.

values.name: Hidden
values.description: Gradients are completely hidden or formally proven to be unrecoverable.

values.name: Strong
values.description: Strong gradient masking techniques used, making gradient-based attacks significantly more difficult.

values.name: Basic
values.description: Basic gradient obfuscation methods employed, but gradients can still be partially recovered.

values.name: None
values.description: Gradients are easily accessible and interpretable, no masking techniques used.
